channel.title: Skillcape error
channel.description:
I'm recieving this error, i can't figure it out.
[code=java]src\server\model\players\packets\ClickingButtons.java:29: cannot find symbol symbol : method skillCapeEquipped() location: class server.model.players.Client if (!c.skillCapeEquipped()) { ^ Note: Some input files use unchecked or unsafe operations. Note: Recompile with -Xlint:unchecked for details. 1 error Press any key to continue . . .[/code]

item.title: Skillcape error
item.dc:creator: @SacredHeart SacredHeart
item.description:
@SacredHeart wrote:

[quote=“teh one, post:10, topic:405718”]Just a question, are you using the PI base? Because adding the method into the client won’t fix that error. Your probably going to need to add the method in Player.java.

Try adding this code somewhere in your player.java, you decide where.

public boolean skillCapeEquipped() { for (int i = 10639; i < 10663; i++) { for (int j = 9747; j < 9812; j++) { if (playerEquipment[playerCape] == i || playerEquipment[playerCape] == j || playerEquipment[playerCape] == 10662 || playerEquipment[playerCape] == 9949 || playerEquipment[playerCape] == 10646 || playerEquipment[playerCape] == 9948) { return true; } } } return false; } [/quote]
Okay, thanks.

Read full topic

item.title: Skillcape error
item.dc:creator: @teh_one teh one
item.description:
@teh_one wrote:

Just a question, are you using the PI base? Because adding the method into the client won’t fix that error. Your probably going to need to add the method in Player.java.

Try adding this code somewhere in your player.java, you decide where.

public boolean skillCapeEquipped() { for (int i = 10639; i < 10663; i++) { for (int j = 9747; j < 9812; j++) { if (playerEquipment[playerCape] == i || playerEquipment[playerCape] == j || playerEquipment[playerCape] == 10662 || playerEquipment[playerCape] == 9949 || playerEquipment[playerCape] == 10646 || playerEquipment[playerCape] == 9948) { return true; } } } return false; }

Read full topic

item.title: Skillcape error
item.dc:creator: @SacredHeart SacredHeart
item.description:
@SacredHeart wrote:

ziplock:

Write whatever you want the method to do. Obviously it should be a Boolean that detects if you are wearing a skill cape or not. That’s not too hard to write up at all.

I don’t know how to do it.

Read full topic
